issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: In -[TiUIView setBackgroundImage_:], the second-to-last line `self.clipsToBounds = bgImage!=nil;` indicates that clearing bgImage will turn off clipsToBounds, despite the possibility of subviews needing clipping or rounded corners needing clipping. This is NOT a regression, as this code has existed previously.
fields.summary: iOS: Clearing backgroundImage turns off clipsToBounds
